definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: I love this early morning, I love this Prague only scarcely dotted with visitors. On the Charles Bridges, pigeons are the only visitors looking for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 我愛這清晨，這遊人尚還稀少的布拉格。

sentences.english: I enjoyed a plain steamed dumpling as a very nice morning treat.
sentences.chinese: 我喫的是素包子，清晨的盛宴。

sentences.english: In early morning mist that rolls in from the coast, two brown bears tussle like teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 清晨，霧從海岸邊湧來，兩隻棕熊像頑童般嬉鬧。

sentences.english: Hast thou commanded the morning since thy days; and caused the dayspring to know his place;
sentences.chinese: 你自生以來，曾命定晨光，使清晨的日光知道本位。

sentences.english: Early one morning, Shmi was attacked and abducted by the savage Tusken Raiders.
sentences.chinese: 一天清晨，野蠻的塔斯肯襲擊者毆打併綁架了施密。

sentences.english: The sparrows chirp outside the window every morning.
sentences.chinese: 麻雀每天清晨在窗外嘁嘁喳喳地叫。

sentences.english: One man is walking along the beach in Camptown, South Africa.
sentences.chinese: 清晨，一個人在南非開普敦海灘漫步。

sentences.english: Yet every morning there was God's provision waiting to be gathered.
sentences.chinese: 然而，到每天清晨，神卻預備了食物供他們收取。

sentences.english: I need my coffee to wake up my brain.
sentences.chinese: 清晨，咖啡可以提神醒腦。

sentences.english: Product description: Use as needed! We like to use this blend afterschool, in the morning, and in the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 我們喜歡讓孩子放學後，清晨或是在教室裏用一用。

sentences.english: The joy of a morning in spring, the faith of a mustard seed.
sentences.chinese: 春日清晨的歡愉，芥末種子的信誠。

sentences.english: His eyes twinkled with emotion like droplets of dew on an early morning.
sentences.chinese: 他的眼睛以像露珠的小滴在一個清晨的情緒閃爍。

sentences.english: I work before the morning, I was happy all the day.
sentences.chinese: 清晨我醒來，整天都樂開懷。

sentences.english: Every morning, a fresh offering of bric-a-brac from the grandfather to Cosette.
sentences.chinese: 每天清晨外祖父都送來一些古董給珂賽特。

sentences.english: Taitung area in the early morning before the emergence of typhoon circling foehn .
sentences.chinese: 臺東一帶則於清晨颱風繞圈前出現焚風。

definition: in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
first thing in the morning/at daybreak
first rays of morning sun/first glimmer of dawn
time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
